system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision colorizable. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "colorizible" date: "$Date: 2013-05-30 14:33:11 -0700 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92653 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xmlEV_COLORIZABLE_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_colorizable_i.xmlEV_COLORIZABLE_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_set_default_colorsset_default_colors end
feature -- Access
f_background_color_internal../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_background_color_internalbackground_color_internal: ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR -- Color of face. local color: FalsePOINTER do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_background_color_impbackground_color_imp as l_background_color_imp then Result := l_background_color_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falsetwin else color := ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_background_color_pointerbackground_color_pointer create Result Result.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_rgb_with_16_bitset_rgb_with_16_bit ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_redgdk_color_struct_red (color), {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_greengdk_color_struct_green (color), {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_bluegdk_color_struct_blue (color)) end end
f_foreground_color_internal../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_foreground_color_internalforeground_color_internal: ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR -- Color of foreground features like text. local color: FalsePOINTER do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_foreground_color_impforeground_color_imp as l_foreground_color_imp then Result := l_foreground_color_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falsetwin else color := ../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_foreground_color_pointerforeground_color_pointer create Result Result.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_set_rgb_with_16_bitset_rgb_with_16_bit ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_redgdk_color_struct_red (color), {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_greengdk_color_struct_green (color), {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_bluegdk_color_struct_blue (color)) end end

f_visual_widget../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget: FalsePOINTER deferred end

f_background_color_pointer../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_background_color_pointerbackground_color_pointer: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to bg color for a_widget. do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_style_struct_basegtk_style_struct_base ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_rc_get_stylegtk_rc_get_style (../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_visual_widgetvisual_widget)) end

f_prelight_scale../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_prelight_scalePrelight_scale: FalseREAL_32 = 1.0909488 -- Prelight color is this much lighter than ../implementation_interface/ev_colorizable_i.xml#f_background_colorbackground_color.
f_highlight_scale../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_highlight_scaleHighlight_scale: FalseREAL_32 = 0.90912397 -- Highlight color is this much darker than ../implementation_interface/ev_colorizable_i.xml#f_background_colorbackground_color.
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_colorizable_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_colorizable.xmlEV_COLORIZABLE note option: stable attribute end
